column2: Doesn't matter if you're a Halfling, an Ogre or something else, the promise of good grub is worth fighting for.
Halflings have a knack for dodging blows before pin-pointing exposed armour and thrusting their blade.
Devoted to their gods these Arabyans give out a shrill howl in their honour.
Fimir surround themselves with a magically-created mist, through which the Fimir are barely discernable from a distance of more than a few metres.
This halfling has mastered the arts of deception and distraction.
